com.astamuse.asta4d.render

Class DebugRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.astamuse.asta4d.render.Renderer
      • com.astamuse.asta4d.render.DebugRenderer

  • public class DebugRenderer
extends Renderer
    When this renderer is applied, the current rendering element (see Context.setCurrentRenderingElement(Element)) will be output by logger in debug level.
    Author:
    e-ryu
